challenges.name: A Network Trace
challenges.desc: As you search for a way to learn more about the pirates of this world, you come across a strange capture. It is oddly highlighted, as if they want to show us something.

challenges.name: Irony
challenges.desc: One of the hackers is a GameBoy fan. You might find a crucial element to trace them in this file that was lingering on the network.

challenges.name: Jakshu
challenges.desc: During a radio communication interception, you understand: We all loved C at some point, right? The next day, you find a file on a suspicious server. Maybe it is the key to the hack?

challenges.name: Prety Poor Privacy
challenges.desc: Find and decode hidden flag in the file

challenges.name: WarmUP
challenges.desc: Hey there, welcome. This is a warmup, enjoy. You intercepted a communication upon entering the virtual world. A file has been downloaded; you might find an answer in it.
